I really don't think a lot of people are considering how *massive* of a buff to basically *everything that doesn't build Last Whisper* the Last Whisper remake is.

Just to put it out there, you need about 700 bonus armor for the new Last Whisper to provide as much penetration as the one on Live.  This means if an ADC buys Whisper their damage is going to be taking a pretty major hit against soft targets.  If they *don't* buy Whisper, tanky folks are going to walk right over them.
It also either gives 15% damage amp against people with more HP than them (everyone), or grievous wounds. I don't really call that a nerf.

Grievous Wounds affects very few tanks to be honest. Drain Tanks, Mundo, and Voli are the only ones who are really going to notice it and most other melees burst the ADC before they even regen... so... yeeaah.

The 15% amp is only good against tanks. I should note most tanks have a base of about 70ish armor at max level. 70 armor is still about 41%. Since LW only affects bonus now, they'll never effect that 70 armor, which is about 28 ArP they would have gotten that they don't get anymore. 

Honestly, tanks will still tank, but melee carries will be squishy as hell. Given most melee carries are getting this very same nerf/boost on top of getting other good AD items, plus most of the same items the Marksmen are getting, they're really not affected.

The 15% amp is not only good against tanks. It's 1.5% per 50 hp, maxing at 500. ADC's have low base stats, so even against someone who's built NO hp, they'd likely get 5 to 10% increased damage, and nearly everyone picks up some HP, from sightstone to RoA to Black Cleaver.

Supports: " Yes~ Changes nobody hates or cares about! "
Assassins: "The time is almost upon us brothers, we will dine in Nerfed Mages and ADC blood!"

There you go. This sums up everything for each role.  The reason why formal talk does not work is because when people see the PBE they see the massive one sided buffs to ADC and nerfs to every other role.  I'm a Sup/Jg main so these changes do little to me, but even I can understand the reactions people are having.  


The ADC early game is so powerful currently that it is actually better to run 4ADC due to the CC boosts.  They get a ton of Lifesteal, CD by building crit and they solve mana issues all with 1 item, they take reduced damage, mallet is now cost effective for the perma ranged slow, 20% dmg taken is put into bleed which prevents them being taken down easily + a 12% damage reduction item. 

Yes, you can experiment how this works with bruisers and if they can abuse it (despite having range disadvantage or all the new cc/kits adc got) But it still sits, that unless you can 100-0 an Adc (mages cant do this anymore mid-late due to increased costs on ap and all the MR items that are super viable for adc) an Adc will out duel you and kite you to death.   All it takes is frozen mallet for an adc to stop bruisers abusing the new items because they cant get in range + ranged champions get a movement speed boost when Orb walking and all flat % move is removed from most Ad items. 

So unless they are going to remove item passives to rework half of them or increase gold cost of these items by 200-600 (for first 1-2 tiers, same cost at final item) to balance the gold efficiency so it's not OP first item against everyone, this change is just like Mord's.  It's forced onto us to make us bring Adc into other roles.

They just buffed the global gold income to compensate the item cost changes.

Tanks are going to be just fine if not better, the new defensive tree is insanely good.

Bruisers are a balance hell hole that Riot doesn't want to exist anymore, hence the goals of Juggernauts and fighter rework we had in August.

Supports are getting _exactly_ what was being asked for the entirety of this season, a better sightstone with upgrades paths like the jungle items.

I don't care for the assassins because it's an entire role Riot still has to do an overhaul for like they did for all the other roles, there is no point in thinking long term for them at this point in time.

This applies to both tanks and mage items, but they are getting toned down due to how powerful the new masteries are for them.

The reactions people having are premature and mostly stupid. The amount of people saying Season 6 is the death of League on day 1 is ridiculous and proper discussion should be encouraged further not just understood.

the best comp is now 4 ADCs + 1 support.

1. Top lane ADC needs high base damage and can build semi-tanky. Looks like Vayne or Graves are good.
2. The team needs some sort of initiation and CC. Oh look, Kalista + Thresh or Ashe + Braum does all that.
3. The team needs waveclear and poke. Hmm, Varus or Sivir mid solves those problems.
4. The team needs a ganking jungler. Turns out Twitch, Jinx and Kindred can jungle. While Jinx and Kindred are farm junglers, Twitch has terrifying ganks, and can snowball out of control just as easily as Rengar or Eve.

There is now absolutely no downside for running 4 ADCs. They can do it all.
